weaponBlueprint.desc: Frost Lasers are one of the few weapon types capable of locking down rooms, keeping most crew from entering or leaving.

Frost Lasers are one of the few weapon types capable of locking down rooms, keeping most crew from entering or leaving.

weaponBlueprint.desc: A specialized Laser that does high bio damage and cripples crew, but no system or hull damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_PARTICLE

weaponBlueprint.desc: Shoots streamlined bolts which do heavy system damage. Does not harm crew or hull, and cannot lower shields.

weaponBlueprint.name: MINELAUNCHER_1
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Geb' Mine Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Mine Launchers charge quickly and fire a burst of slow moving projectiles. Also serves as an efficient way to lay traps for the fleet.
	
	Provides 2 fleet delay for 13 missiles at empty beacons.

weaponBlueprint.desc:

	Provides 1 fleet delay for 3 missiles at empty beacons.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires 1 missile; does 1 damage; pierces all shields.

weaponBlueprint.desc: Slow charging 2 shot Laser weapon. Conservative weapons use no power on their own but require the system itself to be powered.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Conservative weapons feed off of power leaks in a system, so they don't need to use any power themselves. As consequence, they take longer to charge and require another weapon to be powered.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_HARDSCIFI
weaponBlueprint.title: Laser Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: A very realistic Beam that obeys REAL SCIENCE. And it's actually a Laser! Lasers don't shoot projectiles in real life, like what the hell. That doesn't even make sense. Why are Lasers and Beams separate weapons, lasers should be called plasma or something because that's what they really are. And why are beams impacted by shields? If beams are lasers and lasers are light shouldn't they be able to go through shields perfectly fine? It's not like shields are that opaque, I mean you can see through them almost perfectly, it literally makes no sense why is it like this, people really need to stop avoiding the question and just fix this obvious mistake, sheesh.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Large beam that does 3 damage per room.

weaponBlueprint.desc: Special loot weapon. See tooltip in the inventory to check the improvements over the base version.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires two lasers that deal 1 damage each. Cooldown drops the more it fires.

weaponBlueprint.name: LOOT_MATH_2
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Subtracter'
weaponBlueprint.desc: Special loot weapon. See tooltip in the inventory to check the improvements over the base version.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: No hull or system damage, but deals much bio damage

weaponBlueprint.name: LOOT_MATH_3
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Multiplier'
weaponBlueprint.desc: Special loot weapon. See tooltip in the inventory to check the improvements over the base version.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires a blast of debris across a random area doing up to 3 damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: LOOT_MATH_4
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Divider'
weaponBlueprint.desc: Special loot weapon. See tooltip in the inventory to check the improvements over the base version.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: One damage per room beam weapon. Ignores 3 shields

weaponBlueprint.name: LOOT_MATH_5
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Equalizer'
weaponBlueprint.desc: Special loot weapon. See tooltip in the inventory to check the improvements over the base version.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires a single blast that does 1 ion damage. Can hit and disable shields as well as systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: LOOT_MATH_6
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Percentage'
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Special loot weapon. See tooltip in the inventory to check the improvements over the base version.
	
	Provides 3 fleet delay for 15 missiles at empty beacons.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires 1 missile; does 1 damage; pierces all shields.

weaponBlueprint.name: LOOT_MATH_7
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Greater Than'
weaponBlueprint.desc: Special loot weapon. See tooltip in the inventory to check the improvements over the base version.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires 1 missile; does 3 damage; pierces all shields.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_BATTERY
weaponBlueprint.title: Battery Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This unique weapon provides 2 power to whichever weapon is directly to the right of it in the weapon list.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_BATTERY_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic Battery Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc:
This unique weapon provides power to whichever weapon is directly to the right of it in the weapon list.
	Chaotic variant provides 3 power but has an extremely slow swipe speed.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_QUICK
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Kalis' Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Despite its appearance, this weapon has a respectable damage potential if properly supported.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_QUICK_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic 'Kalis' Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Despite its appearance, this weapon has a respectable damage potential if properly supported.
	Chaotic variant sacrifices beam speed for additional length.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_ADAPT_3
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Tsukiyari' Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This advanced Beam was a prototype upgrade of the well known Kamayari and Suyari Beams.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_ADAPT_3_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic 'Tsukiyari' Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc:
This advanced Beam was a prototype upgrade of the well known Kamayari and Suyari Beams.
	Chaotic variant scales by 2 damage per shot, but requires you to have 10 missiles on-hand to fire (does not consume them).
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: BIG_ION
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Big Ion'
weaponBlueprint.desc: A Pre-emptive Ion weapon that charges so fast it can be used right at the start of battle, but can only be fired once per combat. Does immense Bio and Ion damage and never misses. Texas Red won't be getting up after this one.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: BIG_ION_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic 'Big Ion'
weaponBlueprint.desc:
A Pre-emptive weapon that charges so fast it can be used right at the start of battle, but can only be fired once per combat. Does immense Bio damage and never misses. Texas Red won't be getting up after this one.
	Chaotic version does 20 system damage but no ion damage, and pierces all shields.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_CONSERVRECYCLER
weaponBlueprint.title: Sustaining Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc: This Bomb charges slower than most, but is completely self-sustaining. It uses no missiles or power, only requiring other sources of power in the system.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_CONSERVRECYCLER_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic Sustaining Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc:
This Bomb charges slower than most, but is completely self-sustaining. It uses no missiles or power, only requiring other sources of power in the system.
	Chaotic variant provides 1 additional power and charges 3 seconds quicker, but loses its status effect chances.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_DRAIN
weaponBlueprint.title: The Big Suck Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc: Using patented technology, this Bomb launcher might not do any damage to crew or systems, but grants additional power draining to all crew that it hits. Crew impacted by this will drain power from any ship for 10 seconds. Sometimes also stuns crew.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Bomb weapon; requires a missile; heals nearby crewmembers. Can target your own ship.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_DRAIN_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic The Big Suck Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Using patented technology, this Bomb launcher might not do any damage to crew or systems, but grants additional power draining to all crew that it hits. Crew impacted by this will drain power from any ship for 10 seconds. Sometimes also stuns crew.
	Chaotic variant costs no missiles to fire and charges 2 seconds quicker.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Bomb weapon; requires a missile; heals nearby crewmembers. Can target your own ship.

weaponBlueprint.name: FROST_CHARGEGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Frost Charger
weaponBlueprint.desc: This Laser weapon can charge multiple times, giving it additional projectiles. As a Frost weapon, it locks down rooms, and does extra damage and stun to enemy crew.
weaponBlueprint.descriptionOverride:
This Laser weapon can charge multiple times, giving it additional projectiles. As a Frost weapon, it locks down rooms, and does extra damage and stun to enemy crew.
	
	Stats:
	Required Power: 2
	Charge Time: 3 seconds

	Shot Radius: 55
	Shots Per Charge: 1
	Max Charge Shots: 4

	Base Hull Damage: 1
	Total System Damage: 1
	Total Crew Damage: 30

	Locks down rooms on hit
	Stun Chance: 100% (3 seconds long)
	
	Default Price: 80~   -   Selling Price: 40~
weaponBlueprint.tooltipOverride:
Required Power: 2
		Charge Time: 3 seconds

		Shot Radius: 55
		Shots Per Charge: 1
		Max Charge Shots: 4

		Base Hull Damage: 1
		Total System Damage: 1
		Total Crew Damage: 30

		Locks down rooms on hit
		Stun Chance: 100% (3 seconds long)
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: FROST_CHARGEGUN_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic Frost Charger
weaponBlueprint.desc:
This Laser weapon can charge multiple times, giving it additional projectiles. As a Frost weapon, it locks down rooms, and does extra damage and stun to enemy crew.
	Chaotic version spawns angry snowmen in each room it hits.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_CHAIN_CHARGEGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Chainger
weaponBlueprint.desc: This Ion weapon can charge multiple times, giving it additional projectiles. With each shot, the ion damage increases.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_CHAIN_CHARGEGUN_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic Ion Chainger
weaponBlueprint.desc:
This Ion weapon can charge multiple times, giving it additional projectiles.
	Chaotic variant chains cooldown instead of damage.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_OBSIDIAN
weaponBlueprint.title: Obsidian Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: This powerful Missile is made with an obsidian exterior, causing massive damage to enemy hulls.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_OBSIDIAN_ENEMY
weaponBlueprint.title: Obsidian Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: ENEMY VERSION YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_OBSIDIAN_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic Obsidian Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc:
This powerful Missile is made with an obsidian exterior, causing massive damage to enemy hulls.
	Chaotic variant does 12 damage with no hullbust and never misses, but charges 3 seconds slower.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: SNIPER
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Nevermiss'
weaponBlueprint.desc: A slow charging but high damage Laser with large pierce capability. Cannot miss, and always inflicts a breach.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Sniper; 2 damage, 1 shot, pierces 3 shields. 17 second cooldown. Does x2 damage on systemless rooms.

weaponBlueprint.name: SNIPER_ENEMY
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Nevermiss'
weaponBlueprint.desc: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Sniper; 2 damage, 1 shot, pierces 3 shields. 17 second cooldown. Does x2 damage on systemless rooms.

weaponBlueprint.name: SNIPER_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic 'Nevermiss'
weaponBlueprint.desc:
A slow charging but high damage weapon. Cannot miss, and always inflicts a breach.
	Chaotic variant fires a higher damage Pinpoint beam but has no bonus shield pierce or hullbust.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Sniper; 2 damage, 1 shot, pierces 3 shields. 17 second cooldown. Does x2 damage on systemless rooms.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHOTGUN_STEEL
weaponBlueprint.title: Steel Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc: This modified Flak cannon fires bursts of heavy metal that move slowly but inflict much greater damage to a ship's hull integrity.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHOTGUN_STEEL_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic Steel Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc:
This modified Flak cannon fires bursts of heavy metal that move slowly but inflict much greater damage to a ship's hull integrity.
	Chaotic variant has no radius and fires 2 extra shots but takes 4 power.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: SLOTGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Slotgun
weaponBlueprint.desc: An older, formerly ballistic-based launcher that has been repurposed into a strange, shotgun-like delivery system for poker chips. While wildly inaccurate, provides a good source of constant suppression - sometimes at a cost.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: SLOTGUN_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic Slotgun
weaponBlueprint.desc:
An older, formerly ballistic-based launcher that has been repurposed into a strange, shotgun-like delivery system for poker chips. While wildly inaccurate, provides a good source of constant suppression - sometimes at a cost.
	Chaotic variant costs 3 missiles to fire but has 12 shots and increased status chance.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHOTGUN_TOGGLE_FIRE
weaponBlueprint.title: Toggle Flak [Fire]
weaponBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Fire] A special Flak weapon which can switch between three elemental modes. Cooldown, power, and projectile count stays the same between all variants.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires a blast of debris across a random area doing up to 7 damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHOTGUN_TOGGLE_ION
weaponBlueprint.title: Toggle Flak [Electric]
weaponBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Electric] A special Flak weapon which can switch between three elemental modes. Cooldown, power, and projectile count stays the same between all variants.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires a blast of debris across a random area doing up to 7 damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHOTGUN_TOGGLE_TOXIC
weaponBlueprint.title: Toggle Flak [Radiation]
weaponBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Radiation] A special Flak weapon which can switch between three elemental modes. Cooldown, power, and projectile count stays the same between all variants.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires a blast of debris across a random area doing up to 7 damage.

weaponBlueprint.title: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS
weaponBlueprint.desc: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS

weaponBlueprint.title: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS
weaponBlueprint.desc: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS

weaponBlueprint.title: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS
weaponBlueprint.desc: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS

weaponBlueprint.name: SHOTGUN_TOGGLE_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic Toggle Flak
weaponBlueprint.desc:
A special Flak weapon which fires many different kinds of elemental flak projectiles.
	Chaotic variant does not toggle but fires 3 of each projectile type.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires a blast of debris across a random area doing up to 7 damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHELL_LAUNCHER
weaponBlueprint.title: Toxic Pod Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc: This deadly weapon fires out pods of toxic gas which corrodes systems and harms crew.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires a blast of debris across a random area doing up to 3 damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHELL_LAUNCHER_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic Toxic Pod Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc:
This deadly weapon fires out pods of toxic gas which corrodes systems and harms crew.
	Chaotic variant fires 3 projectiles.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires a blast of debris across a random area doing up to 3 damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: UNSPOOLER
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Nightshade' Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: A deadly Missile Launcher that fires cloaked warheads that basic Defense Drones can't shoot down, but charges quite slow.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: UNSPOOLER_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic 'Nightshade' Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc:
A deadly Missile Launcher that fires cloaked warheads that basic Defense Drones can't shoot down, but charges quite slow.
	Chaotic variant fires two additional missiles, but missiles only deal ion damage, and also spawn temporary Free Mantis allies on impact.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: MINELAUNCHER_GIANT
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Pharaoh' Mine Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc:
A massive Mine Launcher that fires immense heavy-hitting mines despite an average ammunition price.
	
	Provides 3 fleet delay for 7 missiles at empty beacons.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: MINELAUNCHER_GIANT_ENEMY
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Pharaoh' Mine Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: MINELAUNCHER_GIANT_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic 'Pharaoh' Mine Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc:
A massive Mine Launcher that fires immense heavy-hitting mines despite an average ammunition price.
	Chaotic variant fires a burst of mines rather than one large mine with a higher total damage but no accuracy.
	
	Provides 3 fleet delay for 7 missiles at empty beacons.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Boss Loot.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_LIGHT_CHARGEGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Laser Charger
weaponBlueprint.desc: This fast charging Light Laser can reach a maximum volley of 5 shots for a very low power cost.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires more shots the more it charges, up to a max of 4.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_LIGHT_CHARGEGUN_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic Light Laser Charger
weaponBlueprint.desc:
This fast charging Light Laser can reach a maximum volley of 5 shots for a very low power cost.
	Chaotic variant fires all shots in rapid succession and charges .5s quicker, but costs 3 power.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires more shots the more it charges, up to a max of 4.

weaponBlueprint.name: CRYSTAL_BURST_FIRE
weaponBlueprint.title: Amber Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires 2 heavy and explosive crystal shards that pierce 1 shield each, lock down rooms, and create a fire.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Pierces 1 shield; fires 3 crystals that deal 1 damage each.

weaponBlueprint.name: CRYSTAL_BURST_FIRE_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic Amber Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Fires 2 heavy and explosive crystal shards that pierce 1 shield each, lock down rooms, and create a fire.
	Chaotic version removes fire immunities from all crew and crew drones for 15 seconds.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Pierces 1 shield; fires 3 crystals that deal 1 damage each.

weaponBlueprint.name: STRAWBERRY
weaponBlueprint.title: Strawberry Gun
weaponBlueprint.desc: As it says on the tin.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires 1 kernel; 1 damage; pierces all shields; guaranteed breach.

weaponBlueprint.name: STRAWBERRY_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic Strawberry Gun
weaponBlueprint.desc: As it says on the tin.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires 1 kernel; 1 damage; pierces all shields; guaranteed breach.
weaponBlueprint.descriptionOverride:
As it says on the tin.
	Chaotic variant unleashes the hidden power of the strawberry.
	
	Stats:
	Required Power: 8
	Charge Time: 40 seconds
	Missile Consumption: 1
	Chance for Ammo Replication: 50%
	Wait for it to strawberry.
	
	Default Price: 120~   -   Selling Price: 60~

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_ELITE
weaponBlueprint.title: Promotion Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting and mysterious bomb that swaps out the allied crew it hits with better versions of themselves for 30 seconds when applicable, and also provides a brief surge of active ability charging. Enjoy those fleeting moments while you can before reality comes back to slap you in the face.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Bomb weapon; requires a missile; heals nearby crewmembers. Can target your own ship.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_ELITE_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic Promotion Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Self-teleporting and mysterious bomb that swaps out the allied crew it hits with better versions of themselves when applicable.
	Chaotic variant upgrades crew permanently but costs many missiles.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Bomb weapon; requires a missile; heals nearby crewmembers. Can target your own ship.

weaponBlueprint.name: GASTER_BLASTER
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Blaster' Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: The signature weapon of one of the Multiverse's chief interdimensional scientists, this weapon now belongs to his son. Something something, bad time and dunked on. Can be fired twice in quick succession, but not more than that.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Large beam that does 4 damage per room.

weaponBlueprint.name: GASTER_BLASTER_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic 'Blaster' Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc:
The signature weapon of one of the Multiverse's chief interdimensional scientists, this weapon now belongs to his son. Something something, bad time and dunked on. Can be fired twice in quick succession, but not more than that.
	Chaotic variant charges extremely quickly and is longer but only does 1 damage per swipe.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Large beam that does 4 damage per room.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_HACK
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Gungnir' Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This Beam has the unusual property of inflicting system disruption akin to the Hacking system in place of conventional system damage. It cannot disrupt systems impeded by a Hacking drone.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Beam weapon, 2 damage per room.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_HACK_CHAOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaotic 'Gungnir' Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc:
This Beam has the unusual property of inflicting system disruption akin to the Hacking system in place of conventional system damage. It cannot disrupt systems impeded by a Hacking drone.
	Chaotic variant has Pinpoint length, but hacks for longer.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Beam weapon, 2 damage per room.

weaponBlueprint.name: MODULAR_CHARGE_BASE
weaponBlueprint.title: Modular Missile Charger
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Produced by Hektar Industries(TM), this is the base for a Modular Missile Charger. It supports 1 attribute module and 1 status module.
	Incompatible with the pierce module.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires 1 missile; does 2 damage; pierces all shields.

weaponBlueprint.name: RUSTY_LASER_BURST_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Old Burst MK I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This simple Burst Laser isn't flashy but it gets the job done. Very old and has worse aim.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Shoots 2 lasers that do 1 damage each.

weaponBlueprint.name: RUSTY_LASER_BURST_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Old Burst MK II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Slightly improved version of the Burst Laser that fires more shots per charge. Very old and has worse aim.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires 3 lasers, 1 damage each.

weaponBlueprint.name: RUSTY_LASER_BURST_5
weaponBlueprint.title: Old Burst MK III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Powerful Burst Laser that fires off an impressive barrage. Very old and has worse aim.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires 5 lasers, 1 damage per shot.

weaponBlueprint.name: RUSTY_LASER_HEAVY_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Old Heavy MK I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Heavy Lasers can wreak more havoc than their smaller Burst Laser counterparts. Very old and has worse aim.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires 1 shot, causes 2 damage with low chance of fire and breaching.

weaponBlueprint.name: RUSTY_MISSILES_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Old Leto
weaponBlueprint.desc: This launcher is outdated and weak, but can still be effective. Very old and has worse aim.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires 1 missile; does 1 damage; pierces all shields.

weaponBlueprint.title: Old Artemis
weaponBlueprint.desc: Standard missile launcher on most Federation ships. Very old and has worse aim.

weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires 2 missiles; 2 damage each; pierces all shields.

weaponBlueprint.name: SENTRY_NORMAL
weaponBlueprint.title: Nano-Sentry Deployer
weaponBlueprint.desc: Deploys a temporary sentry in the room of impact, which will disperse nanites that damage enemy crew at a rate of 7hp/s for 20 seconds.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Deploys a sentry.

weaponBlueprint.name: SENTRY_MIND
weaponBlueprint.title: Neuro-Sentry Deployer
weaponBlueprint.desc: Deploys a temporary sentry in the room of impact, which will induce panic in enemy crew in the room, causing them to avoid it for 20 seconds as long as they have another system to flee to.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Deploys a sentry.

weaponBlueprint.name: SENTRY_HEAL
weaponBlueprint.title: Medi-Sentry Deployer
weaponBlueprint.desc: Deploys a temporary sentry in the room of impact, which will heal allied crew and crew drones at a rate of 6hp/s and provide 25% damage resistance to them for 20 seconds.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Deploys a sentry.

weaponBlueprint.name: SENTRY_FROST
weaponBlueprint.title: Cryo-Sentry Deployer
weaponBlueprint.desc: Deploys a temporary sentry in the room of impact, which halves the movement and repair speed of enemy crew in the room and disables their abilities for 20 seconds. These effects are nullified in the presence of fires.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Deploys a sentry.

weaponBlueprint.name: SENTRY_VAMP
weaponBlueprint.title: Vamp-Sentry Deployer
weaponBlueprint.desc: Deploys a temporary sentry in the room of impact, which decreases enemy and increases ally Max Health by 40% for 20 seconds.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Deploys a sentry.

weaponBlueprint.name: SENTRY_NORMAL_SURGE
weaponBlueprint.title: Nano-Sentry Deployer
weaponBlueprint.desc: Deploys a temporary sentry in the room of impact, which will disperse nanites that damage enemy crew at a rate of 7hp/s for 20 seconds.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Deploys a sentry.

weaponBlueprint.name: SENTRY_FROST_SURGE

weaponBlueprint.name: MODULE_BIO
weaponBlueprint.title: RAD Module
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Hektar Industries(TM) brand Status RAD Module. Turn your modular weapons into the perfect anti-crew weaponry!
	Combine with Hullbuster Module to restore hull/system damage in addition to crew damage bonus, but lose out on hull bust properties.
	Laser Effects: 0 hull/system dmg, 30 crew damage, +1 shield pierce
	Beam Effects: 0 hull dmg (system dmg is preserved), 60 crew damage, +1 shield pierce
	Missile Effects: 0 hull/system dmg, 90 crew damage
	Ion Effects: 60 crew damage (on direct hits)
	Weapons also gain standard Anti-Bio crew debuffs. (66% slowed speed and repairs, 75% increased stun duration)
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Storage Weapon

weaponBlueprint.name: MODULE_COOLDOWN
weaponBlueprint.title: Cooldown Module
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Hektar Industries(TM) brand Status Cooldown Module. Turn your modular weapons into power efficient fast firing assault weaponry!
	No incompatibilities.
	Effects for all weapons: Reduces cooldown by 25%
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Storage Weapon

weaponBlueprint.name: MODULE_LOCKDOWN
weaponBlueprint.title: Lockdown Module
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Hektar Industries(TM) brand Status Lockdown Module. Turn your modular weapons into the next generation of tech and cause chaos on the enemy ship with patented lockdown tech!
	Incompatible with the Modular Beam.
	Effects for all weapons: Applies lockdown on impact
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Storage Weapon

weaponBlueprint.name: MODULE_PIERCE
weaponBlueprint.title: Pierce Module
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Hektar Industries(TM) brand Status Pierce Module. Never deal with enemy fortifications ever again!
	Incompatible with the Modular Missile.
	Laser/Beam Effects: +1 shield pierce, +30% breach chance
	Ion Effects: +3 shield pierce (affects shield as it passes through)
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Storage Weapon

weaponBlueprint.name: MODULE_STUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Neural Module
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Hektar Industries(TM) brand Status Neural Module. Turn your modular weapons into crew disrupting neural weaponry!
	No incompatibilities.
	Laser Effects: applies 12 seconds of stun (subsequent projectiles refresh the duration)
	Beam Effects: applies 18 seconds of stun
	Missile Effects: applies 14 seconds of stun
	Ion Effects: applies stun equal to ion duration +2s
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Storage Weapon

weaponBlueprint.name: MODULE_ACCURACY
weaponBlueprint.title: Accuracy Module
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Hektar Industries(TM) brand Attribute Accuracy Module. Ensure your weaponry stays on target on the battlefield!
	Incompatible with the Modular Beam.
	Laser/Ion Effects: +20% accuracy buff
	Missile Effects: +100% accuracy buff
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Storage Weapon

weaponBlueprint.name: MODULE_FIRE
weaponBlueprint.title: Firestarter Module
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Hektar Industries(TM) brand Attribute Firestarter Module. Create devastating infernos with your modular weaponry!
	No incompatibilities.
	Laser Effects: +30% fire chance
	Beam Effects: +40% fire chance
	Missile Effects: +100% fire chance
	Ion Effects: +100% fire chance (on direct hits)
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Storage Weapon

weaponBlueprint.name: MODULE_HULL
weaponBlueprint.title: Hullbust Module
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Hektar Industries(TM) brand Attribute Hullbust Module. Decimate the enemy's hull with heavy hitting modular weaponry!
	No incompatibilities. When combined with the RAD module, will return to default hull damage but will not have hull bust properties.
	Laser/Beam/Missile Effects: x2 damage on systemless rooms, +10% breach chance [Breach stacks with Pierce Module breach chance]
	Ion Effects: Ion becomes Energy; hull damage equals ion damage (but no system/crew damage), +10% fire chance
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Storage Weapon

weaponBlueprint.name: MODULE_HULL_VISIBLE
weaponBlueprint.title: Hullbust Module
weaponBlueprint.desc: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Storage Weapon

weaponBlueprint.name: MODULE_POWER
weaponBlueprint.title: Power Module
weaponBlueprint.desc:
Hektar Industries(TM) brand Attribute Power Module. Get more bang for your buck with your modular weaponry!
	Laser Effects: +2 projectiles, +1 power cost, +2s cooldown
	Beam Effects: +60 beam length, doubled beam speed, +30% breach chance, +1 power cost 
	[Breach stacks with Pierce Module breach chance]
	Missile Effects: +1 damage, +1 power cost
	Ion Effects: +1 ion damage, +1 power cost
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Storage Weapon

weaponBlueprint.name: POWER_CORE
weaponBlueprint.title: Power Core
weaponBlueprint.desc:
While useless as an actual weapon, the power core provides immense amounts of power to the weapons to the right of it.
	[In order for weapons to function, there must be at least one normal reactor power allocated to the weapon system]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Storage Weapon

weaponBlueprint.name: SCANNER_RECON
weaponBlueprint.title: Projector [R]
weaponBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Recon] A recon tool designed by the Federation to surveil on enemies from a distance and train gunmen, or lure out enemies with holographic bait. Can be toggled between recon mode for quick cooldown or bait mode to spawn holograms that last for 20 seconds.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Reveals the inside of rooms.

weaponBlueprint.name: SCANNER_BAIT
weaponBlueprint.title: Projector [B]
weaponBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Bait] A recon tool designed by the Federation to surveil on enemies from a distance, or lure out enemies with holographic bait. Can be toggled between recon and bait modes.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Reveals the inside of rooms.

weaponBlueprint.name: HARPOON_LAUNCHER
weaponBlueprint.title: 'Oekpiiitan' Harpoon Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc: An antique weapon from the Federation-Mantis War. While very outdated, it pierces 2 shields, creates breaches, and most importantly creates deep lashes in crew, causing a stacking -3hp/s for 25 seconds every time they get hit.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires 1 missile; does 2 damage; pierces all shields.

weaponBlueprint.title: Clone Cannon [Empty]
weaponBlueprint.desc: No weapon has ever sparked a larger ethical controversy, but if it works it works. Currently has no crew assigned.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires a blast of debris across a random area doing up to 3 damage.
